website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably-priced option that gets high marks for its versatility as a boot for work or play.
pros: Fits perfectly right out of the box with no break-in period
Praised for its use as a work, hiking, or horseback riding boot
cons: Some reports of craftsmanship issues after a few months, particularly with the leather separating and the sole coming apart

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last two months
customer_reviews.text: The boots look great and are lightweight. Perfect light duty boots for long hours in a moderate work environment. Unfortunately they run a little wide. This is a size 12 regular and the lacing area is almost touching together. They're are still loose around the ankle. Update: Didnt last two months. Purchased on June 8th and before July 25th they started coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jeptha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of the H2O model for my wife. After seeing how well they fit right out of the box, I bought a pair for myself. I called Ariat Customer Service for advice. I wanted to know if they ran large or small. Ariat was very helpful. My boots fit perfectly right out of the box and I had no breaking in period. All that and waterproof as well. After several months, they’re as comfortable as ever. Excellent company with excellent customer service making excellent boots.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Boots fit as expected. I have wide feet and the EE which is not usually offered was perfect. They are very well made and look nice enough hang out and go places with, not just for hiking or shoveling snow which was what they were intended for. Haven't tested their water proof quality yet so will follow up on that with the next snow which might be in a few days. Wore them for about 6 hours the first day and they were comfortable until the last 30 minutes or so. As they are leather they will conform to my feet for longer wear. .
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Widen

customer_reviews.title: Good to start, didn't wear well.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was really pleased by this product. They're comfortable to hike in, warm, fit well and and had become my go to shoes to wear with jeans. HOWEVER after only about 60 days I see where one of the eyelets is starting to separate from the leather upper and will likely rip out altogether in a short period of time. I would have expected better quality more durability in a hiking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: A good buy if you're not using these bo ots I the woods
customer_reviews.text: Shoes firlt alright and we're ok for the first couple months. The shoes are waterproof but, once they get wet they warp and start to fit loosely. On top of that the toe piece started to come undone around month 3. I buy boots pretty regularly and expect them to last me at least one full season. But, for it to be ariat I would expect more from a boot instead of a solid 3 or 4 months. If you are going to get this boot I hope you are just buying it to wear around and say you wear them in the woods when you really don't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boots for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looked around quite a bit before settling on these boots. The price point was where I wanted to be for a pair of hiking boots, but I was concerned about whether or not the quality would be sufficient. Now I wear them all the time and couldn't be happier with them. The only complaint I could make is that the tread isn't as aggressive as I would have liked for actual hiking in the woods. Otherwise, they are perfect for every wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: He loves these boots...
customer_reviews.text: My husband just wore out his last pair of these. He thought that the previous pair had lasted him around 10-12 years. He wore them hiking, and doing handyman work (on his feet all day) and were comfortable for that long. He wasn't sure about this pair being "copper" colored. Luckily it was mostly dark brown with a slightly orange cast to them. "Burnt orange " would be a better name but even that suggests more orange than they actually are. He liked the first pair so much that he searched to find another pair same style and brand of shoes, and that should tell you something.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Lotta Books

customer_reviews.title: Shoes Won't Slip in Rainy Weather
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to me as good shoe to wear in the rain after dangerous slips and falls with other boots. So far, holding up as promised in rainy weather, though NOT water proof. (Other than gaiters, what shoe is?) They were so-so comfortable until I replaced the inserts with "work boot" orthotics; now, they're the most comfortable shoes I own, and I wear them daily! Would give it five stars, but for having to replace the inserts with comfortable orthotics, adding to the cost of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: B'Davka

customer_reviews.title: My husband says they are the most durable, comfortable boot he's ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: My husband LIVES in these boots! He has 4 pair, one for yard work, one for daily wear, and a couple of spare pairs, he's afraid they won't have these when he wants to reorder. He does LOTS of yard work and watering for his precious plants year round and they usually hold up a year. They are waterproof and comfortable. Its hard for me to get him to change out of them when we go out. Hope they continue to make these for years to come. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry

customer_reviews.title: I Do Not Recommend This Boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boot from Amazon on September 24, 2018, less than one year ago. Last week, the sole became separated from the upper - see picture. My rough estimate is that I have walked approximately 300 miles in these boots. Like others say, they are comfortable at first and waterproof too. I have had other boots fail, but never this fast. Beware, potential purchasers!
customer_reviews.author: emgee123

customer_reviews.title: My pick of the litter of 7 different brands. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots for the money I have ever owned. Compare with several of the much higher priced boots I have owned. I am hard on boots and these are holding up very well, working at our car wash and around our farm. I was encouraged to try these with the new Amazon "buy after you try" policy. I ordered 7 pairs of boots and tried them all on for comfort, and ease of putting on and taking off after walking on carpet thru the house. What a deal. Thank Amazon for this new program!
customer_reviews.author: not Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The product was not exactly what I was expecting, they are not really a boot in my mind, they are more akin to a sturdy shoe. They are well made, look good, and are a fine product for casual wear or light hiking/walking or light chore work. For them to be a work boot they would need a thicker sole for rock protection and a higher heel for in the saddle, in my opinion. Otherwise, they are a really nice product. No, I didn't send them back, I kept them and wearing them now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boot Defect
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this boot before and wore them everyday for a year. They were awesome boots. This pair of Ariat boots wore great for 1 week and then the second week it is apparent that the right boot has some sort of defect in it. The right boot has caused damage to my heel. Had to switch to my old pair of boots and the damage was corrected within a few days. Disappointed that this pair of quality boots has left me -$80 and I am left wearing my old boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Cold and Slippery
customer_reviews.text: I wear 8.5M, and ordered accordingly, the fit of this boot is as expected (good). Overall I like how the boot fits and looks however, I found that they are cold to wear, had to buy wool socks to keep my feet warmer. Also the rubber sole is very slippery when wet and walking on certain hard surfaces such as metal, wet wooden steps, etc. In other words, not much grip. Another downside is they are not very breathable, so my feet sweat inside.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: My wife has three pairs of Ariats and has loved all three. She finally talked me in to buying a pair and I am glad she did. These are really nice boots, good fit and after wearing a few times to break in, these have become my favorite casual shoe. I have rarely had boots as I did not like the heaviness but these have given me a new prescriptive. These have replaced my regular walking shoes. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great daily boot
customer_reviews.text: Been about a year since I bought these shoes. I commute a 1200cc motorcycle through rain and sunshine. These shoes are worn everyday. They've held up rather well with a monthly treatment with polish and dubbin. Mostly waterproof at 60 mph in the rain, only torrential downpour and riding in 2 ft of water has compromised them. They're comfortable and breathe well in the tropical heat. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kheng

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The first pair had the soles separating from the upper, got a replacement pair and they are doing the same thing ( 2 months old). Very disappointed, would not recommend, or buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Richards

customer_reviews.title: Fit is just a little big
customer_reviews.text: I had to send back and order a size smaller which is working good for me now. Order a half to a full size smaller than you usually wear. These are very comfortable and so far seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This boot is stretching out at the after a short time.
customer_reviews.text: Love a lot about this boot. It was larger than expected, didn't order the "D" version and that's turned out to be a problem. The ankle is so stretched out that I'm going to have to buy extra long strings to wrap around my ankle. I bought these in July. Should have gone back to the Columbia's I retired. That being said, they seem like good boots, staying dry with no extra treatment and I'm in and out of water a lot. I'll probably complain less in the winter when I bulk up my socks. I really like the all leather, no fabric design.
customer_reviews.author: Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The fit was almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding a shoe or boot that will fit my feet comfortably and will remain comfortable wearing them all day. Not so with these boots. The fit was almost perfect. The boots are a bit heavy but very comfortable. Normally I replace the inner sole with my own orthotic but I did not have to do that with these boots; so much better than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Silverback

customer_reviews.title: Boots that fit right are extremely important !!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Ariat weatherproof hiking boots. I use them for my hiking adventures and for working on the farm. The initial fit is very important. I have found that the more I wear them, the more comfortable they become. Footwear is so important for your outdoor activities. Make sure you look at Ariat's before deciding.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stotler

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it that I thought I was buying a new ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it that I thought I was buying a new product and it arrives in an obviously used box with a wadded piece of paper for packaging. Shoes seem fine. Pictures tell the story.
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: I’ll order again when needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I have typically worn the pull on style boots but have recently started climbing trees again. So, I ordered this style. These boots break in within a couple days and are extremely comfortable. FYI: I wear a size 12 in almost any shoes/boots out there but Ariat is always 11.5 for me. I’d suggest ordering .5 less than your non-Ariat boot size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good walking/ and hiking boots. 4 and 1/2 stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for my husband. Ariat is an excellent shoe and boot maker. We do moderate hiking and these boots will be perfect for that. They fit properly and are waterproof. They are exactly what I ordered. The only thing that might make them a little better would be to have lugs on the soles or a vibram sole.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for riding and hiking.
customer_reviews.text: Third pair in 10 years. Great all around boot. Easy to get in and out of the stirrups. Has ridge in heel to accommodate spurs. Beautifully finished with no loose threads. With these boots I don't require an additional insert. They were delivered in two days with amazon prime. I can't speak highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Warren B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Good Work Boot
customer_reviews.text: I knew I needed to get these for my husband after he started complaing about buying another pair of boots that only last 2 years. I've had the womens version for 5 years and am very happy. Front the first try he was smiling. We'll see if his can't last as long as mine.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boot ever
customer_reviews.text: I'm a carpenter, I am on my 6th pair of these in probably 8 years. I work on hard surfaces most and have all day comfort. I probably have sold 7-8 pairs to my friends whom also love them. I like the arch support and the sole. Aggressive soles twist my knee and cause pain these are more like a deck shoe but well padded. They should last about a year if you're not too hard on them. I also have done lot's of hiking in the same boot with no issues. Other than I wish they had a better warrantee but worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dag Zoeck

customer_reviews.title: the report I got is that they were great. They appear to be high quality boots for ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my kid for horsemanship camp (ymca). They require the kids to have a boot with a one-inch heel so that their foot will remain anchored in the stirrup. These boots fit the bill and are typically marketed for horse riding, amlnd can be found at horse/tack shops. I bought these on Amazon and saved a few bucks. I don't know how well these work for hiking, but for jorse riding, the report I got is that they were great. They appear to be high quality boots for the price point. I spoke to the manufacturer on the phone and they were very nice and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: mark a.

customer_reviews.title: Best boots and price
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased Ariat cowboy and hiking boots before and they fit better than any other brand I've tried. Quality materials and construction make wearing these boots all day a very comfortable experience. If you have arch problems try Ariat
customer_reviews.author: rg

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They are comfortable, and fit better than the boots I was issued in the Army. My only complaint is a small piece of flexible fabric on the inside that chafes my feet, but it's only an issue when wearing thin sneaker socks so I won't dock a star for it. Incredibly well-made, cozy, and affordable. I'm recommending these to my friends and other hiking enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: Friedrich S

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these daily. They're dry in the winter so warm enough for conditions as long as the snow's not over the tops. Comfortable and great shoe for farm work and hiking, etc. The waterproof version is MUCH superior to the regular shoe -- stays dry and warm in all conditions. Been wearing these for about 6 years. I keep a new pair in reserve all the time. I have a "work" pair that I wear in the mud and muck around the place and a "nice" pair that I wear to the office daily. Usually get about a year out of each.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good for hiking on flat terrain.
customer_reviews.text: The boot was comfortable in a wide but a little too long in a 12EE The sole isn’t very textured and I experienced some slippage. Not the best choice on slippery mountainous terrain. It was waterproof in normal circumstances of dewy or post rain ground. Did not walk in any standing water though. (Husband’s review)
customer_reviews.author: D. da Silva

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, comfortable boot.
customer_reviews.text: needed a new hiking boots for the winter. these were on sale so I thought I would try them. they are light weight but durable. very good water proofing, keep my feet dry. the fit (12EE) is exactly what it should be, they fit me real well. just a nice fitting lightweight comfortable boot, wish I bought two pair...
customer_reviews.author: R. J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Comfortable durability
customer_reviews.text: My husband's daily work shoes, extremely durable, super comfortable. His last pair lasted 1 1/2 years, pretty good run considering he's in construction so on ladders, in mud, climbing around on various equipment etc. They finally began to break down and he complained of his legs feeling tired so got him a new pair of same style Ariats. Problem solved. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: They wear well and fit great.
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third pair of these boots. I use them for hiking trips to the Rockies of Montana every year, to daily chores in Oklahoma. They wear well and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: randy h adams

customer_reviews.title: Might be the last boot you need to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my third pair. I’ve never bought three pairs of anything. I got them when I first started working in Alaska. They last a long time, fit well, and work in any environment.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Thomas Foss

customer_reviews.title: They fit great especially with a good insert
customer_reviews.text: The water proof lining made them too warm to wear during summer months. I'm returning them and ordering a non water proof pair. I've had a standard pair for about a year. I wear them daily around my farm and never leaked all last winter. The lower sides are now starting to come apart, so it's time for a new pair before winter. They fit great especially with a good insert.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: These boots are not comfortable at all even after a decent break in period. I will never buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These are perhaps the most uncomfortable boots I have worn, including the boots that were issued to me 40 years ago when I entered military basic training. The soles are stiff as is the hard leather they are made from. I would not recommend these boots at any price. These are maybe $30 boots that I paid $90 for. Ariat has entered a new low with this particular boot.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, support, no leaking!
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable right out of the box. Stood in a stream when looking at houses and no leaking. Looks great and I can hike all day. Great traction, and the soles don't hold mud to track inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair. I trail ride horses ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I trail ride horses and I would wear nothing else. My only complaint is that I have to buy mens because Ariat refuses to understand that some women have wide feet. This is my second pair and my first pair last me 4 years. 4 years of heavy wear through the mud and red clay of the south. Nearly all of my barn friends wear them as well. And they ARE waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Gwen M. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Nice but do NOT last.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I have bought in the last 6 months. Both pairs of these have now done the same thing. I thought the first pair was a fluke because I got them wet everyday (even though they say "waterproof"). But now that the second pair has worn out the same way, I will definetely not be buying a 3rd. Which stinks because they are very comfy but i can't waster $100 every 3 months either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I bought. First ones lasted seven years of daily use. Apparently my foot has gotten bigger. I used to wear 9.5 but now I need 10 2E. They took the first pair I ordered back with no question and even provided the return shipping label. These shoes still need a slight break-in period, but once you get them broken in they are very comfortable. I wear them to work every day and since I ride a motorcycle they provide additional protection for my ride.
customer_reviews.author: Bobn

customer_reviews.title: I liked them so much I bought a second pair and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am reluctant buying cloths over the WEB. Amazon lowered the price on these, which were just what I wanted, so I pulled the trigger. They are high quality and fit perfectly. I liked them so much I bought a second pair and shelved them for later.
customer_reviews.author: PackRat

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my husband-i am on my third ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband-i am on my third pair. He started wearing them-he is on his feet all day- and in about a week he told me to order him another pair. He has worn wolverine boots in the past but over the past few years they have changed & he won't wear them anymore. The fact that he wanted another pair & is wearing these without complaining says ALOT. The only problem he had was with the tab on the back. He cut it off because his pant leg kept getting hung up.
customer_reviews.author: Rhene Price

customer_reviews.title: Great fit .... POOR build quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed... 1st this is the best fitting boot I have ever bought. It is truly extra wide. It is just a shame the quality is crap.. I would have never expected these to have fallen apart the way they did...
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B.

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots.
customer_reviews.text: I work in the health care field and am walking all day long, After a short wear-in period, These shoes are much more comfortable than the Keens that they replaced. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boot leaked!
customer_reviews.text: Excited, heard so many good things about the Ariat Brand. Waterproof outside, Waterproof inside. First outing, just walking down an alley after a good rain. Oops, major leak right boot. It can happen right. It’s ok I ordered some waterproof Rancher H20. Receive today will let you know
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My wife’s been wearing these boots for a long time she finally talked me into trying them I just started wearing them and so far they do not need to be broken in they are very lightweight yet have nice arch support I am happy so far
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Returned item
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these boots before & loved them. However this pair had a "seam" going through the middle of both heel "pockets" so the seam rubbed on my achilies tendon. I returned them & bought a pair @ Tractor Supply where I could try them on.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: they seemed fine. Walking is fine but since they are a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not really put these to the test yet. The few times I have ridden in them, they seemed fine. Walking is fine but since they are a bit loose on me, they don't provide the best of ankle support. I'll probably try a half size smaller if I decide to order these again and maybe my opinion will change.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort you’ll love
customer_reviews.text: Such great quality. My husband used these for work and had his last pair for a few years before needing a replacement. Had to buy them again because they are so nice. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Tajadod

customer_reviews.title: A BOOT BUILT TO LAST
customer_reviews.text: We have bought Ariats for twenty years. They continue to be well made, while other companies are lowering quality Ariat is still maintaining standards. These however are not waterproof. You will need to put some kind of waterproofer on them. I used Sno-Seal, two coats and they drank it up. For all you ladies it will darken the color a bit but your feet will stay dry. I have Ariats that are 20yrs old and still doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: ChristianConservative

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but falls apart
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is comfortable but is falling apart with only one month of use. The black material around toes are piling off. I would not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: size listed not correct
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered it was supposed to be an Extra Wide which is EE. The ones I got were only E or wide
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and supportive. They are great looking to wear any time but also work well for working outside. This is my 2nd pair. That's how much I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great Work Boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who's very particular about his work boots. His current project is located in a secured federal building and he needed boots that he didn't have to remove to walk through the metal detector (unlike his usual steel-toed boots). He loves these boots! They're very comfortable and he still feels supported and safe wearing them on construction jobsites.
customer_reviews.author: MDanks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boots to fit in during snowy season.
customer_reviews.text: Ariat boots were somewhat comfortable, but was hard to enjoy wearing them for a long period. If you buy this make sure you, REALLY, check if these boots fit you.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Gormley

customer_reviews.title: They’re waterproof too!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Great boots. Couldn’t find them in a brick and mortar any more so checked on amazon and voila!!! This is probably the 6th or 7th pair of Ariat boots that my husband, who is a land surveyor has owned!! They’re waterproof too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best boots ever
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box. My husband and I love Ariat. Very supportive and hug your feet. He walks all day at work, and I walk dogs in the woods every day. No sore feet or legs ever. We have been buying this style for years.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wise

customer_reviews.title: and my feet feel great wearing my Ariat Terrains
customer_reviews.text: I work in a barn with horses and other animals. I am a riding instructor and am always on my feet. My fit bit shows that I average 17,000 steps per day( I have walked over 35,000 in a day), and my feet feel great wearing my Ariat Terrains. These have to be the most comfortable boots I own. Also, they are 100% waterproof. Walking in the morning dew, mud, rain or snow, I have never had wet socks. And the leather is strong, and has held up to all the barn chores, as well as being stepped on by occasionally by a horse.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For less than $100, these are great waterproof leather shoes. I saw some reviews that showed that the boots fall apart over time. It looks like those reviewers used these shoes "harder" than I intend. I use them primarily to ride my motorcycle and for regular street use. I've been wearing them for about 2 weeks and the fit is as expected. I usually wear a 12 wide and these were spot on for my size. If I have any issues with these shoes, I'll update my review. So far, so good though.
customer_reviews.author: Drew K

customer_reviews.title: Like the looks, you’ll LOVE the performance!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned many pairs of these boots. It’s pretty much all I wear. They are comfortable and well made. I always have a couple new pair in my closet. They are the best!
customer_reviews.author: R. Craig

customer_reviews.title: This is my husband's favorite work shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These are my husband's 5th or 6th pair of this boot. They fit perfectly. He put them on as soon as they arrived and wore them all day with no break in period. Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.author: CMac

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I needed for my trip to the Pacific NW. Amazingly it didn't rain, just some snow. They were comfortable right out of the box and were great for the moderate hiking we did.
customer_reviews.author: D. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, thank you Ariat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband after many years of wearing boots, he loves these!!! The comfort is perfect for someone that are walking on concrete all day. He also says, "The waterproof is on the mark". His feet have not gotten wet in these boots since they were bought in March, he also has to be in water frequently.... Our orthopedic doctor highly recommends these to his patients after he purchased a pair for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pulls my sock down
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair loved them till this pair of boots pulls my right sock down,new or old socks one foot only????
customer_reviews.author: Frank Roberti

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very tough on shoes. This shoe has stood up very well. I got about eight months out of my last pair. The leather held up, did not tear out in any parts of the leather. The wear started showing in toe rubber and alont the inside sole where it was separating from the leather. It is a very well built shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie S.

customer_reviews.title: quality/cost/availability
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit and quality of these shoes. Not only were they $30.00 less expensive than my local outlet but was able to get the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbi

customer_reviews.title: First Hiking Boots
customer_reviews.text: I'm an older guy and recent convert to hiking. I bought these in anticipation of some semi-serious hiking in the Pacific NW (> 6 mile days, 10K climbs). They have been great. Today I went on a moderate east coast hike and forgot that I was wearing them for hours afterward (precipitating my thoughts to write this review). Very comfortable, excellent support, built to last. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Right  Out Of The Box
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Ariat riding boots before, so I know they're top quality. I was surprised how little breaking in they took; comfortable the first time on.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Sarocky

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer...
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight of the boot. They're not to heavy. I originally ordered size 11EE and expected them to fit but had to exchange for 11- 1/2 EE US. The exchange was flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Patterson III

customer_reviews.title: This wide size is EE not EEEE
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality but they were a little too long and not as wide as I need. No slam on the boot. The burden of a guy with fat feet! Hahaha
customer_reviews.author: The actual Old Dog

customer_reviews.title: Worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes/boots. They could have a better rubber front with more inner shielding in the toe bow but otherwise they’re outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: JRC

customer_reviews.title: Just completed first 5 mile hike in easy mountain path and felt great
customer_reviews.text: Just completed first 5 mile hike in easy mountain path and felt great. Held up well when rubbing against rocks, no major foot fatigue, no too wet out and could not test its waterproff qualities. over all I liked shoe. The only draw back was the soles are not ribbed and slightly too smooth.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Possible a miss-sized right shoe.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great shoe, my issue with them is, I don't think the right shoe is labeled correctly, it was so tight I could barely Get into it. The right shoe destroyed the back of my ankle, very painful. But the left shoe fit like a glove. Obviously, I'm returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: darren adkins

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Boots
customer_reviews.text: They're Ariats so you know they're good quality boots. They are also very comfortable and light and a stylish enough to wearalmost anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reich

customer_reviews.title: The best. hands down...
customer_reviews.text: I am really hard to fit. have multiple foot problems. Have tried dozens of boots and shoes over past 10 years and this is only thing I can wear without lots of pain. I have to use special insoles any way so lack of arch support all in perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Lou1100

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: Cant seem to find a better boot.. but I've only tried 1 other pair in the last 5 yrs. I've been electrocuted in these boots and still wore them afterwards.. I was only missing my 2 pinkie toes. I'm pretty rough on my boots doing gutters at a fast pace kicking ladders and whatnot.. we work in rain and snow.. they are waterproof for longer than any other boot I've had Great boot! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: carlan

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes for a few days now and so far they have been very comfortable The price I paid through Amazon was $30.00 cheaper then any of the stores in my area, so this was a big factor for my purchase. My son had recommended Araits to me as guys he works with, who have similar foot issues as I ,really like them.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair, I'm on my feet 10hrs a day these boots are very comfortable. And their not a heavy boot like the boots I used to wear. If you want a comfortable good fitting, long lasting,affordable boot this is it.
customer_reviews.author: curtis r.rone

customer_reviews.title: Second pair of these boots for hubs
customer_reviews.text: Husband LOVES this boot. He works outside for telecommunications company and has certain specifications for work boots. These meet them all.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: waterproof footwear...
customer_reviews.text: Great, great, and great. Perfect for working in the barn, riding, doing chores while feet stay dry and supported.
customer_reviews.author: RidingtheDance

customer_reviews.title: Good durable product
customer_reviews.text: Good durable product. I lead intepretive hikes on trails through a volcanic landscape at a national monument. These casual boots have a good grip and are comfortable. All boots get torn up in this landscape, but I expect the Ariat Terrain boot to last two seasons. This type of terrain abuse will tear up any boot, but I can afford to replace these every 2 - 3 years. Great boot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 77 year old mother who has misshapen feet and wears men’s shoes. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable but the quality is a little lacking
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable but the quality is a little lacking, the black wrapping on the toes is stating to peal off
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: This is his second pair the first pair lasted three years so glad they still making these they r very good work boots
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca shouldice

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots for Riding and the Barn!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic all around boots for barn chores and for riding. High quality these will last a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: J. Maldenas

customer_reviews.title: Comfort + Quality = Ariat
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding comfort and sturdy, just what you would expect from an Ariat boot. I am on my feet at work for eleven hours and during that time walk an average of ten miles. These boots are an excellent choice for this kind of work.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of these boots I've had and I love them. I wear them for work and never distracted by sore feet! The boots are pretty water resistant but the fabric tongue is not.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for hiking / walking. Very comfortable with tread design that is not slippery. The shoes are light. I got the EE as I have a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: frank c. mandrino

customer_reviews.title: 18 months worn almost everyday
customer_reviews.text: Finally wearing out the heal after 18 months of hard wear walking the dog 4 to 6 miles a day. Judge for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Bob and Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Great work boot for me
customer_reviews.text: Great work boot for me, lightweight, waterproof, and very comfortable. No break-in is really needed, good to go right out of the box. This is my third pair, Ariat makes a great boot.
customer_reviews.author: HWilhite

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and looks!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Tried on boots once recieved and it was like they were automatically broke in and felt great. Got them for motorcycle boots. Very nice and very happy!
customer_reviews.author: vtxkid

customer_reviews.title: These are the best boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these boots for husband. He has chronic back problems . He can wear these without his back hurting or feet aching. These are great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Anette

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable boots. I took a 1 mile walk as soon as I received them. No problems!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Best boot for hiking I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: While I have walked enough to be positive, all indications are this is the best fitting walking and hiking boot I have ever owned. They fit perfect and in addition to feeling comfortable there are very nice looking boot. I am not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jarhead

customer_reviews.title: Just try them, they know how to make them......
customer_reviews.text: 3rd year in a row for buying these boots. Still wearing the 1st years boots for work. 2nd years for nicer events, and the 3rd....still in the box. Love these, will buy a 4th pair 11 months from now.
customer_reviews.author: D Gruver

customer_reviews.title: Repels water like a duck!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, light but stable. Repels water like a duck! Buy it if you have the cash!
customer_reviews.author: Tryitagain

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and west well.
customer_reviews.text: I have mid width feet with high arches. Seem to fit me well. I walk in them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kannianen

customer_reviews.title: Solid boots.
customer_reviews.text: Great warmth and waterproofness. Hiked them right out of the box & they felt great.
customer_reviews.author: R Owen

product_meta.title: Ariat Men's Terrain H2O Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: Ariat was founded with one simple objective: to provide the most technologically advanced riding boots for the world's top equestrian athletes. Today, Ariat is the leading performance footwear and apparel brand for equestrian athletes around the world. From show jumping to team penning, Ariat boots provide the foundation upon which world-class athletes work, ride, and compete.
feature_bullets: Gel-cushioned footbed with heel stabilizer delivers support, rebound, and stability
Waterproof, oiled full grain leather lining upper
